mean_en: a stamp or mark put in your passport by officials of a foreign country that gives you permission to enter, pass through or leave their country
sentence: I've got my visa ready, and now I can travel around the world!
sentence_trans: 我拿到了我的签证，现在我可以环游世界啦！
word_etyma: vis看 + a → 审视，审查 → 审查后的签证 → visa签证，签准
